svs.name: State vs State (SvS)
svs.description: Cross-state PvP competition. Rally enemy cities, kill troops, gather points.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Focus on expedition skills over exploration. Jessie and Jeronimo are best rally joiners for attack.

hall_of_chiefs.name: Hall of Chiefs
hall_of_chiefs.description: Month-long server-wide competition for top rankings.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Save speedups and resources for HoC weeks. Coordinate big upgrades with alliance.
March speed and capacity matter. Coordinate with alliance for timing.
Coordinate rally timing with R4/R5. Defense matters as much as offense.

bear_trap.name: Bear Trap
bear_trap.description: Alliance PvE event. Defeat bears together.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Exploration skills matter here, not expedition. Healing is important.

crazy_joe.name: Crazy Joe
crazy_joe.description: Alliance PvE wave defense event with 20 phases. Occurs roughly every other week with 2 separate battles per occurrence at different times.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Infantry-heavy combat. Use expedition skills. 90/10/0 Infantry ratio. Joe targets backline so marksmen get wiped.
Save flames for Flame Lotto. Don't spend flames randomly.

bear_hunt.name: Bear Hunt
bear_hunt.description: Hunt powerful bears on the map for rewards.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Gordon's poison is especially effective here. Coordinate with alliance.

lucky_wheel.name: Lucky Wheel
lucky_wheel.description: Spin for hero shards and items.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Save spins for featured heroes you need. Check hero tier before investing.

intel_missions.name: Lighthouse Intel Missions
intel_missions.description: Daily exploration missions from the Lighthouse.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Use your best exploration team. Philly's healing is essential.
Progress through zones systematically. Don't skip ahead without proper gear.
Coordinate with alliance. Save upgrades for this event.
Coordinate with alliance. Complete stages together.

mercenary_prestige.name: Mercenary Prestige
mercenary_prestige.description: Defeat 50 Phaethon Mercenaries across difficulty tiers. Features both personal challenges and alliance boss fights.

personal_challenge.boss_note: Every 10th level is a boss with better rewards - use team rallies on these!
personal_challenge.unlock_note: Must complete all 50 levels to unlock next difficulty. Takes 10 events minimum to unlock all difficulties.

alliance_challenge.name: Phaethon Captains
alliance_challenge.trigger: R4/R5 can summon when enough members complete requirements
alliance_challenge.strategy: Everyone sends a troop to hit it first, THEN send full rally march after all participants have attacked

tips: Use Gina (4+ stars) to reduce stamina costs by 20%
Every 10th level boss gives better rewards - call team rally for these
If you can't beat a level solo, ask an alliance member to hold a rally for you
You get 5 help requests per event (+1 each time you help someone)
Save help requests for higher difficulty levels
You don't need to be in the rally to get rewards - just request help
Trade help with alliance members: they rally yours, you rally theirs

optimizer_relevance.tip: Start with Gina for stamina savings, swap to your main team when you hit a wall.

canyon_clash.name: Canyon Clash
canyon_clash.description: Alliance vs Alliance battle in canyon terrain.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Coordinate timing with alliance. Control key positions.

foundry_battle.name: Foundry Battle
foundry_battle.description: Compete for control of foundry resources.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Coordinate with alliance for resource control.

alliance_mobilization.name: Alliance Mobilization
alliance_mobilization.description: Alliance-wide activity event. Complete tasks together for alliance rewards.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Complete your daily tasks. Coordinate big upgrades during this event.

sunfire_castle.name: Sunfire Castle
sunfire_castle.description: Explore and conquer the Sunfire Castle dungeon.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Progress through stages systematically. Bring a healer.

frostfire_mine.name: Frostfire Mine
frostfire_mine.description: Mine resources from the Frostfire Mine dungeon.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Maximize resource extraction. Coordinate with alliance.

brother_in_arms.name: Brother In Arms
brother_in_arms.description: Alliance kill event. Earn points by killing enemy troops.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Coordinate rallies with alliance. Target weak enemies.

alliance_championship.name: Alliance Championship
alliance_championship.description: Top alliances compete for server championship.

optimizer_relevance.tip: Only for top alliances. Requires maximum coordination.

resource_management: Save speedups for Hall of Chiefs
Save flames for Flame Lotto events
Coordinate big upgrades with alliance during competitive events
Don't waste stamina outside of events

hero_selection.pve_events: Use exploration skills team: Philly (healer), Wu Ming, Blanchette, Mia
hero_selection.pvp_events: Use expedition skills team: Jeronimo, Jessie (attack) or Sergey (defense)
hero_selection.rallies: Jessie or Jeronimo in leftmost slot for attack rallies

point_multipliers.note: Some events have point multipliers based on VIP level, buffs, or alliance tech
